 1910:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, error}]),
 1911:     {error,[_|_],[_|_]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, error}]),
 1912:     error = compile:file(Simple, [report, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, undefined_error}]),
 1913:     {error,[_|_],[]} = compile:file(Simple, [return, {parse_transform,generic_pt}, {action, undefined_error}]),
 1914: 
 1915:     ok.
 1916: 
 1917: compile_partition_warnings(Source, Opts) ->
 1918:     case compile:file(Source, [binary, return | Opts]) of
 1919:         {ok,big,<<_/binary>>,Ws0} ->
 1920:             [{_SourcePath,Ws}] = Ws0,
 1921: 
 1922:             %% Return {[ColumnWarning], [LineWarning]}.
 1923:             lists:partition(fun({{L,C},_,_}) when is_integer(L), is_integer(C) -> true;
 1924:                                ({L,_,_}) when is_integer(L) -> false
 1925:                             end, Ws);
 1926:         Error ->
 1927:             Error
 1928:     end.
 1929: 
 1930: %% Cover the erl_compile API used by erlc.
 1931: erl_compile_api(Config) ->
 1932:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1933:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1934:     Simple = filename:join(DataDir, "simple.erl"),
 1935: 
 1936:     Opts = #options{outdir=PrivDir},
 1937:     BinOpts = Opts#options{specific=[binary]},
 1938: 
 1939:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts),
 1940:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{cwd=PrivDir,includes=[PrivDir]}),
 1941:     {ok,simple,_} = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1942: 
 1943:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[dabstr]}),
 1944:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[to_core]}),
 1945:     ok = compile:compile(Simple, "ignored", Opts#options{specific=[to_asm]}),
 1946: 
 1947:     SimpleAbstr = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.abstr"),
 1948:     SimpleCore = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.core"),
 1949:     SimpleAsm = filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.S"),
 1950: 
 1951:     ok = compile:compile_abstr(SimpleAbstr, "ignored", Opts),
 1952:     ok = compile:compile_core(SimpleCore, "ignored", Opts),
 1953:     ok = compile:compile_asm(SimpleAsm, "ignored", Opts),
 1954: 
 1955:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_abstr(SimpleAbstr, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1956:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_core(SimpleCore, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1957:     {ok,simple,<<_/binary>>} = compile:compile_asm(SimpleAsm, "ignored", BinOpts),
 1958: 
 1959:     NeedsDefines = filename:join(DataDir, "needs_defines.erl"),
 1960:     ok = compile:compile(NeedsDefines, "ignored", Opts#options{defines=[compile_this,{'TEST_RESULT',whatever}]}),
 1961: 
 1962:     ok = file:delete(SimpleAbstr),
 1963:     ok = file:delete(SimpleCore),
 1964:     ok = file:delete(SimpleAsm),
 1965:     ok = file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "simple.beam")),
 1966:     ok = file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "needs_defines.beam")),
 1967: 
 1968:     ok.
 1969: 
 1970: %% Check that an ssa dump contains the pretty printed types we expect.
 1971: %% The module we compile and dump, types_pp, is crafted so it contains
 1972: %% calls to functions which have the result types we want to check the
 1973: %% pretty printer for. We check all types except for bs_context,
 1974: %% bs_matchable and the interval form of float as the first two never
 1975: %% seem to appear in result types and the latter doesn't appear in any
 1976: %% module compiled by diffable.
 1977: types_pp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1978:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1979:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1980:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, types_pp),
 1981:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "types_pp.erl"),
 1982:     Listing = filename:join(TargetDir, "types_pp.ssaopt"),
 1983:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
 1984: 
 1985:     {ok,_} = compile:file(File, [dssaopt, {outdir, TargetDir}]),
 1986:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(Listing),
 1987:     Lines = string:split(binary_to_list(Data), "\n", all),
 1988:     ResultTypes = get_result_types(Lines),
 1989:     io:format("Calls: ~p~n", [ResultTypes]),
 1990: 
 1991:     TypesToCheck = [{make_atom, "'an_atom'"},
 1992:                     {make_number, "number()"},
 1993:                     {make_float, "3.14"},
 1994:                     {make_integer, "17"},
 1995:                     {make_integer_range, "0..3"},
 1996:                     {make_nil, "nil()"},
 1997:                     {make_list, "list(any())"},
 1998:                     {make_list_of_ints, "list(integer())"},
 1999:                     {make_maybe_improper_list,
 2000:                      "maybe_improper_list(any(), any())"},
 2001:                     {make_nonempty_list, "nonempty_list(any())"},
 2002:                     {make_nonempty_improper_list,
 2003:                      "nonempty_improper_list(any(), ''end'')"},
 2004:                     {make_empty_map, "#{}"},
 2005:                     {make_map, "map()"},
 2006:                     {make_map_known_types, "#{integer()=>float()}"},
 2007:                     {make_fun_unknown_arity_known_type,
 2008:                      "fun((...) -> number())"},
 2009:                     {make_fun_known_arity_known_type,
 2010:                      "fun((_, _) -> number())"},
 2011:                     {make_fun_unknown_arity_unknown_type,
 2012:                      "fun()"},
 2013:                     {make_fun_known_arity_unknown_type,
 2014:                      "fun((_, _))"},
 2015:                     {make_unconstrained_tuple, "{...}"},
 2016:                     {make_known_size_tuple,
 2017:                      "{any(), any(), any(), any(), any()}"},
 2018:                     {make_inexact_tuple, "{any(), any(), any(), ...}"},
 2019:                     {make_union,
 2020:                      "'foo' | nonempty_list(1..3) | number(3, 7) |"
 2021:                      " {'tag0', 1, 2} | {'tag1', 3, 4} | bitstring(8)"},
 2022:                     {make_bitstring, "bitstring(8)"},
 2023:                     {make_none, "none()"}],
 2024:     lists:foreach(fun({FunName, Expected}) ->
 2025:                           Actual = map_get(atom_to_list(FunName), ResultTypes),
 2026:                           case Actual of
 2027:                               Expected ->
 2028:                                   ok;
 2029:                               _ ->
 2030:                                   ct:fail("Expected type of ~p is ~s, found ~s",
 2031:                                           [FunName, Expected, Actual])
 2032:                           end
 2033:                   end, TypesToCheck),
 2034:     ok = file:del_dir_r(TargetDir),
 2035:     ok.
 2036: 
 2037: %% Parsing for result types. Remember the last seen "Result type"
 2038: %% annotation and apply it to calls when we see them to a call when we
 2039: %% see them.
 2040: get_result_types(Lines) ->
 2041:     get_result_types(Lines, none, #{}).
 2042: 
 2043: get_result_types(["  %% Result type:"++_,"  %%    "++TypeLine|Lines], _, Acc) ->
 2044:     get_result_types(Lines, TypeLine, Acc);
 2045: get_result_types([Line|Lines], TypeLine, Acc0) ->
 2046:     Split = string:split(Line, "="),
 2047:     Acc = case Split of
 2048:               [_, " call" ++ Rest] ->
 2049:                   case string:split(Rest, "`", all) of
 2050:                       [_,Callee,_] ->
 2051:                           Acc0#{ Callee => TypeLine };
 2052:                       _ ->
 2053:                           Acc0
 2054:                   end;
 2055:               _ ->
 2056:                   Acc0
 2057:           end,
 2058:     get_result_types(Lines, TypeLine, Acc);
 2059: get_result_types([], _, Acc) ->
 2060:     Acc.
 2061: 
 2062: %% Check that the beam_ssa_type pass knows about bs_init_writable.
 2063: bs_init_writable(Config) ->
 2064:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2065:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2066:     InFile = filename:join(DataDir, "bs_init_writable.erl"),
 2067:     OutDir = filename:join(PrivDir, "bs_init_writable"),
 2068:     OutFile = filename:join(OutDir, "bs_init_writable.S"),
 2069:     ok = file:make_dir(OutDir),
 2070:     {ok,bs_init_writable} = compile:file(InFile, ['S',{outdir,OutDir}]),
 2071:     {ok,Listing} = file:read_file(OutFile),
 2072:     Os = [global,multiline,{capture,all_but_first,list}],
 2073:     %% The is_bitstr test should be optimized away.
 2074:     nomatch = re:run(Listing, "({test,is_bitstr,.+})", Os),
 2075:     %% The is_bitstr test should be optimized away.
 2076:     nomatch = re:run(Listing, "({test,is_binary,.+})", Os),
 2077:     ok = file:del_dir_r(OutDir).
 2078: 
 2079: 
 2080: %% Check that an SSA listing contains pretty printed annotations, this
 2081: %% blindly checks that the expected annotation occurs the expected
 2082: %% number of times. Checking that the annotations are correctly placed
 2083: %% and contains the correct information is done in
 2084: %% beam_ssa_check_SUITE.
 2085: annotations_pp(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2086:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2087:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2088:     TargetDir = filename:join(PrivDir, types_pp),
 2089:     File = filename:join(DataDir, "annotations_pp.erl"),
 2090:     Listing = filename:join(TargetDir, "annotations_pp.ssaopt"),
 2091:     ok = file:make_dir(TargetDir),
 2092: 
 2093:     {ok,_} = compile:file(File, [dssaopt, {outdir, TargetDir}]),
 2094:     {ok, Data} = file:read_file(Listing),
 2095:     Lines = string:split(binary_to_list(Data), "\n", all),
 2096: 
 2097:     ResultTypes = get_annotations("  %% Result type:", Lines),
 2098:     10 = length(ResultTypes),
 2099: 
 2100:     Uniques = get_annotations("  %% Unique:", Lines),
 2101:     10 = length(Uniques),
 2102: 
 2103:     Aliased = get_annotations("  %% Aliased:", Lines),
 2104:     13 = length(Aliased),
 2105: 
 2106:     ok = file:del_dir_r(TargetDir),
 2107:     ok.
 2108: 
 2109: get_annotations(Key, [Key,"  %%    "++Anno|Lines]) ->
 2110:     [Anno|get_annotations(Key, Lines)];
 2111: get_annotations(Key, [_|Lines]) ->
 2112:     get_annotations(Key, Lines);
 2113: get_annotations(_, []) ->
 2114:     [].
 2115: 
 2116: %%%
 2117: %%% Utilities.
 2118: %%%
 2119: 
 2120: compile_and_verify(Name, Target, Opts) ->
 2121:     Mod = list_to_atom(filename:basename(Name, ".erl")),
 2122:     {ok,Mod} = compile:file(Name, Opts),
 2123:     {ok,{Mod,[{compile_info,CInfo}]}} = 
 2124: 	beam_lib:chunks(Target, [compile_info]),
 2125:     {options,BeamOpts} = lists:keyfind(options, 1, CInfo),
 2126:     Opts = BeamOpts.
 2127: 
 2128: get_unique_beam_files() ->
 2129:     get_unique_files(".beam").
 2130: 
 2131: get_unique_files(Ext) ->
 2132:     Wc = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "*"++Ext),
 2133:     [F || F <- filelib:wildcard(Wc),
 2134: 	  not is_cloned(F, Ext), not is_lfe_module(F, Ext)].
 2135: 
 2136: is_cloned(File, Ext) ->
 2137:     Mod = list_to_atom(filename:basename(File, Ext)),
 2138:     test_lib:is_cloned_mod(Mod).
 2139: 
 2140: is_lfe_module(File, Ext) ->
 2141:     case filename:basename(File, Ext) of
 2142: 	"lfe_" ++ _ -> true;
 2143: 	_ -> false
 2144:     end.
